description: Defines the area of the block that collides with entities. If set to true, default values are used (a full 16x16x16 block). If set to false, the block's collision with entities is disabled, allowing entities to pass through. If this component is omitted, default values are used.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Collision Box
generated_doNotEdit.description: Defines the area of the block that collides with entities. If set to true, default values are used. If set to false, the block's collision with entities is disabled. If this component is omitted, default values are used.

fields.title: Origin
fields.description: Minimal position of the bounds of the collision box. "origin" is specified as [x, y, z] and must be in the range (-8, 0, -8) to (8, 24, 8), inclusive.

fields.title: Size
fields.description: Size of each side of the collision box. Size is specified as [x, y, z]. "origin" + "size" must be in the range (-8, 0, -8) to (8, 24, 8), inclusive.
